definition[0]: in a place that could be anywhere except here
example[0]: My real father is out there and one day I plan to find him.
definition[1]: where someone or something can be noticed by many people
example[1]: Jerry Lewis is out there all the time raising money for disabled kids.
definition[2]: an idea, work of art etc that is out there is so unusual that it might seem silly or extreme
